comment: Wynncraft-style upgrade tree format for ModularJobs
This format uses explicit connector items for visual paths and archetype-based branches
Each tree has unique archetypes and specializations matching the job theme

meta.name: Mining Basics
description: The foundation of all mining knowledge

meta.name: Foundation
description: Every structure starts with a foundation

meta.name: Structural Mastery
description: Earn 20% more XP from structural blocks

meta.name: Green Thumb
description: A natural connection to the land

meta.name: Casting Off
description: Every great catch starts with a cast

meta.name: Forge Lit
description: The fire is ready, time to craft

meta.name: Arcane Knowledge I
description: 10% more XP from books and tools

meta.name: Arcane Knowledge II
description: 20% more XP from books and tools
